documents.document:
Prevent forgotten password from happening

Windows computer is more and more popular used for work, study, and even for entertainment. Generally speaking, computers play a vital role in our daily life and work. You know that a small computer error may result in terrible results. As common PC users, it's no need to be good at computer, but it's better to master some simple computer knowledge. So you can fix it on your own when a computer problem occurs. Here it shows a simple tip on lost Windows 7 password. A good example of when to use this tip would be when your Windows 7 password forgotten and you are unable to log on the computer again.

We always set a complex password on our Windows 7 system for security, to protect our private files and data from viewing by others. But sometimes you probably find that you url=http://www.resetwindowspassword.com/recover-windows-7-password.html]forgot windows 7 password[/url] and can't login. How do you handel your own password?

If you want to recover windows 7 password, what shoud you prepare for?

1.Search a reliable Windows 7 password recovery software

Today there are many great tools like Anmosoft Windows Password Reset is used to remove Windows 7 password for users. They usually can allow users to get instant access to your locked computer by recovering or resetting the lost Windows 7 password to empty, no matter what caused the lost password.

To different people, the priority of the factors are reliability, easy to use, price, speed and so on.

2.An accessible PC with driver

Windows 7 password reset tool supports to use a third computer to burn a bootable CD/DVD or USB flash drive for your locked computer. Any computer is OK, regardless of its Windows operating system, as long as it has an internal or external driver.

3. A bootable CD/DVD or USB flash drive.

A blank or erasable CD/DVD or USB flash drive is required when you resort to third-party software to reset your lost password in Windows 7.

At last and the most important thing is resort the Anmosoft windows password reset tool to reset windows 7 password.

Answer the question about win 7

Q: I just got this windows 7 computer a few weeks ago from my friends grandpa n it has a password that he or I dont know n its the only account the computer, im not verry good with computers so I dont really know what to do I herd u can use safemode comamd prompt but it never lets me type in what I need someone please help me do I really have to make a windows 7 password reset disk if so how hard is it and how do I do it.

A1: If you feel comfortable with computers you could do this. Shut down the computer and remove all the things plugged into it. Then hit the start up button to discharge and residual power thats roaming in it. Take off the side cover so you can see the mother board. There is a small battery on the motherboard, it is like a watch battery. Touch the metal on the case to make sure you don't have static electricity on yourself. Take out that battery. Let it sit for a minute or two, and reinstall the battery. This will reset password windows 7 and the password will no longer be there.

A2: Do not worry, we can use windows 7 password recover tool to complete this task. Windows Login Recovery is designed for resetting dell Windows 7/vista/XP password. What you should do is prepare a bootable CD/DVD or USB drive and a computer you have access to. Follow four steps help you reset windows password without lose anything:
Note: You also can use Windows Login Recovery to reset Windows 2008/2003/2000 local or domain password easily by these steps on dell computer.

Step 1: Download and install Windows Login Recovery on another computer you have access to.
Step 2: Run the software to create a Windows 7 password recovery disk. You just need to burn it to a blank CD/DVD or USB drive.
Step 3: Insert the Windows password recovery disk to your dell laptop or dell computer, and set the computer boot from the password recovery disk by BIOS setting.
Step 4: After boot from the password recovery disk, Windows Login Recovery will start up and display a friendly operating window. Then you can reset whichever account password of your dell computer just by a few clicks.

You also can use Windows Login Recovery to create a new user with administrator privileges for your dell OEM Windows without login. With this new user, you can login your dell computer directly and access control panel to reset other user password. If you forgot windows 7 admin password, Windows Login Recovery is your best choice.

Active Password Changer Professional

As an effective and simple approach, the Windows reset password tool allows you to recover lost or forgot Windows password with a bootable CD/DVD or USB Drive Flash in a few simple steps at ease, regardless the length or complexity of the password used to be.

This Windows 7 password recovery tool reset password

It is pretty easy for us to forgot Windows 7 password during the busy daily life ,so we have to figure out how to remove windows password.

How to change windows password is a challenge to most of the PC users. However, you would never get puzzled anymore if you use Windows 7 password recovery tool.

This Windows 7 password recovery tool works easily and quickly to reset password windows, besides, it could also recover passwords for other versions of Windows system as well.

This Windows 7 password recovery tool reset password without any data losing or file damage at all by creating password reset disk, so that you have to prepare one CD/DVD or USB drive in advance, then take use of the software on an authorized computer, or else this action will bring you some trouble. It is a pretty easy process to reset Windows 7 password even though you are a newbie.

There is an easy and effective method that is you could use Windows 7 password reset disk, but you must have created the password reset disk first, before you lost Windows 7 password. But please note that the password reset disk will only work for the account it was created for.

To create a password reset disk, you firstly need to log on Windows and enter User Accounts by clicking Start button, Control Panel, User and Family Safety, and User Accounts. Then you can click Create a password reset disk on the left pane. A password reset disk wizard will come up, and then you can follow it to create a Windows 7 password reset disk for your system.

It would be a good idea to get one Windows 7 password reset tool as a timely backup to reset the lost or forgot password for you when in need of password recovery?

Forgot the sa password

Forgot the SA password? Want to reset sa password? To conform to the best security practices, we often change the SA password to a strong password at the first opportunity. But something unpredictable happened, we lost or forgot MS SQL SA password. Wouldn’t you like to reset MS SQL password? If not, then follow this tutorial to learn how to reset ms sql password with AnyPasskey SQL Password Recovery Tool.

Step1: Download the AnyPasskey MS SQL Password Recovery on a PC, and then install and launch it.
Step2: Please click on the 'Open' button to import the target file of master.mdf.
Step3: Make a selection of the SA account and then click on the 'Change Password' button.
Step4: Now entering into your new password and then click on the 'OK' button. You can reset sql sa password in minutes.

Now, you have finish the sql sever password reset process, it is so easy, right?All steps are a child’s job. To use the AnyPasskey SQL Password Recovery, you can take less money and time in the sa password reset process. It will be your best choice if you forgot the sql sever password.

4 versions for us to reset xp password

Creat a strong password for windows pc is a nomal thing for us. In fact, a Windows xp password is a good way to protect your precious computer data from unauthorized users. Unfortunately, you can be easily locked out of computer as the Windows passwords are easily to be forgotten or lost due to various reasons. In order to regain access to your locked computer and your precious data on it, you need to reset Windows xp password.

Firstly, Pick one good Windows password recovery tool
To recover Windows xp password by yourself, you need to use good Window password recovery software.

See if the software can reset lost or forgotten Windows password for your Windows xp.Most of the Windows password recovery software available in the market support password recovery for most popular Windows operating systems, like Windows 7/ Vista/XP.

Windows Login Recovery has 4 editions for us to get windows xp password reset.

Its Professional edition allows you to burn a bootable CD/DVD or USB flash drive to reset lost Windows administrator and user password for Windows 7/Vista/XP/2000/NT.

Secondly, prepare a PC with driver and a bootable CD/DVD or USB drive

Thirdly, burn a bootable CD/DVD or USB flash drive to reset Windows xp password

At last, perform Windows xp password reset with the burned CD/DVD or USB drive
When you have burned a CD/DVD or USB flash drive, you can bypass Windows xp password simply with the burned CD/DVD. Insert the burned CD/DVD or USB flash drive in your locked computer and boot the locked PC from CD/DVD or USB.

Then you can get Windows xp password recovery under Windows PE. First choose the user name whose password you want to reset and click Reset button, and then click Ok to confirm and continue your operation. Click Ok when the password has been successfully reset.

Create a option to reset windows password

our password is the single step to protect the personal information and preventing any unauthorized access to you data. We use password everywhere like for your personal information, for you back account and also to access your personal computer. Have you ever though what will happen if you somehow forget the password for your Windows login? It will ruin all the data on your computer as there will only be one way to use your computer again is by formatting and re-installing Windows afresh. For the very same reason Microsoft has provided an option to create Windows Password reset disk. You can create Windows Password reset disk for Windows Vista and Window 7 as well.

If you are smart have created a Windows password reset disk at some point in the past, now is the time to use it to reset the forgotten Windows password! If you have changed your Windows Vista password after creating it, the disk still work to reset windows password.

Follow the instructions below to recover Windows password.

Step 1: Click “Reset Password” link below the login box. The Password Reset Wizard starts. The Password Reset Wizard allows you to create a new password for your user account.
Then click Next.
Note: you have to insert your windows password recovery disk into your drive firstly, or you’ll get an error message:
Step 2: Pick the right disk if you have more than one.
Step 3: Type in a new password and a hint for the password. Click Next. To close the wizard, click Finish.

Don't worry about logon accounts

When I wake up today, I got a phone call from my friend ming: I forgot Windows vista password for my laptop and reset disc was not created. How do I reset the password?

Many people have this dilemma when using Windows vista system. A strong and unique password is essential to protect our system, but you tend to lost Windows vista password. What to do if we are locked out of computer? The following will tell you how to reset Windows vista password efficiently.

There an easy way to I suggest my friend enable the Windows vista built-in administrator account is to use the Command Prompt.

1. Click Start and type CMD in the search box. Right-click CMD and select Run as Administrator.
2. Click Yes when prompted to allow the Command Processor to run. And then the command prompt will appear. (With the administrator account, you can reset windows vista password of logon accounts as soon as possible and never worry about losing such passwords)
3. Type net user in the command prompt window, and then hit Enter. All the Windows account user names will be listed. You'll also see the Administrator account, but now it is not enabled.
4. Type net user administrator /active: yes and hit Enter to enable Windows vista admin account.

Within the method above, you would not worry about the windows vista password recovery for logon accounts.

Windows Login Recovery is powerful yet easy app

What really makes Windows Login Recovery Enterprise shine, however, is that it offers you 3 options to reset your [link='http://www.windowsloginrecovery.com/reset-windows-xp-password.html']forgotten Windows xp password[/link] and 2 options to reset lost Windows domain password. Regarding a lost Window local password, you can remove or change it so that you can access your computer without a password or with a new password again. Moreover, you can create a new user account with admin privileges to log into computer again. These features are not available in its competitors. When it comes to forgotten domain admin and user password, you can either [link='http://www.windowsloginrecovery.com/reset-windows-xp-password.html']change windows xp password[/link].

Overall speaking, Windows Login Recovery is powerful yet easy app. To get started, you just need to burn a bootable password reset disk with a USB drive or CD/DVD in any computer in a few seconds. Next you can start the compute that you want to [link='http://www.windowsloginrecovery.com/reset-windows-xp-password.html']reset windows xp password[/link] of from the disk for password reset. The whole process will cost you no more than 5 minutes. More details, please watch its user guide: How to use Windows Login Recovery Enterprise.

Another suggestion: Windows Login Recovery Ultimate

Windows Login Recovery Ultimate – allow you to burn a bootable password reset USB drive or CD/DVD to [link='http://www.windowsloginrecovery.com/reset-windows-xp-password.html']recover Windows xp password[/link] on local admin and other user accounts for Windows 7/Vista/XP/2008/2003/2000. Except that, it also can change the forgotten domain password or create a new domain admin account.

Reset windows 7 administrator password

[link='http://www.windowsloginrecovery.com/windows-7-password-recovery.html']Reset windows 7 admin password[/link] - For users who use Win 7 meet problem with lost password, they will have to find out solutions to reset Win 7 password. Here, there are 4 tips for people.

Tips 1: Use a Win 7 recovery disk to reset password

Note?This will only be available before [link='http://www.windowsloginrecovery.com/windows-7-password-recovery.html']forgot Windows 7 password[/link].

Creating a Win 7 password reset disk is the easiest and convenient way to help you reset 7 password, while, and is always the most unfamiliar method for PC users. Now, if you [link='http://www.windowsloginrecovery.com/windows-7-password-recovery.html']forgotten Windows 7 password[/link], please do as the following steps to create a recovery disk, which will help you later or earlier.

A. Start –> Control Panel -> User Accounts.
B.Select the user you need to set a disk.
C. Choose “Prevent a forgotten password” on the left of Related Tasks.
D. Prepare a blank floppy disk and then do the following operation as the Forgotten Password Wizard.
E. When the progress indicator displays 100% complete, click “Next” and then Finish.
F. Remove the floppy disk from PC and keep it.

Then, whoever owns the created disk, he/she can access your account and own the account right to do something. Of course, you can recover [link='http://www.windowsloginrecovery.com/windows-7-password-recovery.html']lost Windows 7 password[/link] with the disk!

Tips 2: Logon with the built-in Administrator account

In Safe Mode (press F8 when PC starts), you can logon with the built-in Administrator user account and reset your lost password with this account if you didn't change its password or can access it.

Tips 3: Use another accounts with administrator rights

If there is still another user account which you remember has administrative privileges, you can opt it for Windows 7 password recovery.

Tips 4: Burn a CD/DVD to [link='http://www.windowsloginrecovery.com/windows-7-password-recovery.html']recover Windows 7 password[/link]

With professional password recovery software, you just need burn an ISO image file to the CD/DVD on an accessible PC. Take Windows Login Recovery Professional as example, you can finish [link='http://www.windowsloginrecovery.com/windows-7-password-recovery.html']Windows 7 password reset[/link] with 3 easy steps:

Step1. Download Windows Password Recovery Basic and burn the ISO file to a CD/DVD or USB flash drive.
Step2. Boot the target computer from CD/DVD or USB flash drive.
Step3. Recover lost Windows 7 password with the burned CD/DVD or USB flash drive.
